data.description_en: Sirius Black III (3 November 1959 – 18 June 1996), also known as Padfoot or Snuffles (in his Animagus form), was an English pure-blood wizard, the eldest son of Orion and Walburga Black, the older brother of Regulus Black, and godfather of Harry Potter. Although he was the heir of the House of Black, Sirius disagreed with his family's belief in blood purity and defied tradition when he was Sorted into Gryffindor House instead of Slytherin at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, which he attended from 1971 to 1978. As the rest of his family had been in Slytherin, he was the odd one out.

data.description_en: Tom Marvolo Riddle – 2 May 1998), later known as Lord Voldemort or, alternatively as the Dark Lord, You-Know-Who, He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named, or, just simply Voldemort, was an English half-blood He was amongst the greatest wizards to have ever lived, rivalled only by Albus Dumbledore. Descended from Salazar Slytherin on his mother's side, through the House of Gaunt, Tom Riddle was conceived whilst his father, Tom Riddle Senior, was under the effects of a love potion supplied by his mother, Merope Gaunt. When the enchantment was lifted, Tom's father abandoned his pregnant wife and returned to Little Hangleton.

This activity led to his gaining many enemies and resulted in his becoming overly-cautious and paranoid about his security later in life. Following his rescue from Barty Crouch Jnr, Moody joined the second Order of the Phoenix and fought in a number of the Second Wizarding War's battles, including the Battle of the Department of Mysteries in 1996 and the Battle of the Seven Potters in 1997, dying during the latter.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【アポリーヌ・デラクール】フラーとガブリエルの母で半ヴィーラ。娘たちと同じ銀色のブロンドの髪を持つ美しい魔女です。
data.name_ja: アポリーヌ・デラクール
data.description_en: Madame Apolline Delacour was a half-Veela French witch who was married to Monsieur Delacour. She was described as beautiful with silver-blonde hair like her daughters, Fleur and Gabrielle; these traits were inherited from Apolline's Veela mother.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【アポリオン・プリングル】ホグワーツの元管理人。フィルチの前任者で、生徒への体罰で知られていました。

data.description_en: Apollyon Pringle was the caretaker at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry during the 1960s, preceding Argus Filch.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【アラベラ・フィッグ】プリベット通りの近くに住むスクイブの老婦人。ダンブルドアの依頼でハリーを見守り、吸魂鬼襲撃事件の裁判で証人として証言しました。
data.description_en: Mrs Arabella Doreen Figg was a Squib, a dealer of cross-bred cats and kneazles, She lived near Harry Potter and the Dursley family, and used to babysit Harry in the 1980s and the early 1990s, mainly to keep an eye on him for Albus Dumbledore. Mrs Figg supported the Order to the best of her abilities, but probably did not fight at the Battle of Hogwarts. She most likely survived the war and continued cross-breeding and trading part-kneazle cats.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【アラゴグ】ハグリッドに育てられた巨大蜘蛛（アクロマンチュラ）。禁じられた森に巣を作り、巨大な蜘蛛のコロニーを築きました。人間を食べる種族ですが、ハグリッドへの恩義から彼だけは襲いませんでした。
data.description_en: Aragog (c. 1942 – 20 April 1997) was an Acromantula owned by Rubeus Hagrid. Like the rest of his species, Aragog had a taste for human flesh and was able to communicate with humans vocally.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【アラミンタ・メリフルア】ブラック家の一員。マグル狩りを合法化する法案を提出しようとしました。

data.description_en: Araminta Meliflua Black was Walburga Black's cousin. She was noted for her hatred of Muggles. She once tried to get the Ministry of Magic to pass a law that would make Muggle-hunting legal.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【アーチー・エイムスロウ】1994年のクィディッチ・ワールドカップの際、マグルの女性が着るネグリジェを着ていた魔法使い。「大事なところに爽やかな風が通るのが良い」と、ズボンを履くのを拒否していました。
data.name_ja: アーチー・エイムスロウ
data.description_en: Archie Aymslowe was a wizard and president of the Fresh Air Refreshes Totally (F.A.R.T.) movement, a fringe group whose members, in direct violation of the International Statute of Wizarding Secrecy, refuse to wear Muggle trousers in public, insisting that they "stem the magical flow at source".

data.tweet_text_ja: 【アーカス】ニワトコの杖を求めてエグバートを殺した魔法使い。
data.description_en: Arcus was a wizard. It was debated whether it was he who became the Master of the Elder Wand after Loxias's death, or if it was Livius.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【アーガス・フィルチ】ホグワーツの管理人でスクイブ。愛猫ミセス・ノリスとともに校内を巡回し、規則違反の生徒を取り締まる厳格な性格で知られています。
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Argus Filch was a Squib and the caretaker of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry since around 1973. Filch usually wandered around the school corridors with his cat Mrs Norris, trying to catch students breaking the school rules and complaining about Peeves the Poltergeist. In 1992, after Mrs Norris was petrified by Salazar Slytherin's Basilisk, Filch was furious; however, his cat was healed by the end of the year.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【アリアナ・ダンブルドア】アルバスとアバーフォースの妹。幼い頃にマグルに襲われ、魔力を制御できなくなりました。アルバス、アバーフォース、グリンデルバルドの三者間の決闘に巻き込まれ命を落としました。
data.name_ja: アリアナ・ダンブルドア
data.description_en: Ariana Dumbledore (c. 1885 – summer 1899) This prompted her father to attack the boys and be imprisoned in Azkaban, while her mother moved the family from Mould-on-the-Wold to Godric's Hollow and kept Ariana hidden away from the general population. Because of this, the few people who saw Ariana often got the impression that she was being imprisoned.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【アーキー・アルダートン】有名な箒設計士。マグル生まれ登録委員会に召喚されたある男性が、この人の息子であると主張していました。
data.name_ja: アーキー・アルダートン
data.description_en: Arkie Alderton was a wizard, a well-known broomstick designer, and the owner of Arkie Alderton's Kwik-Repair Shop.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【アーマンド・ディペット】トム・リドルがホグワーツに在籍していた時代の校長。リドルの秘密の部屋事件を見抜けず、無実のハグリッドを退学処分にしてしまいました。
data.name_ja: アーマンド・ディペット
data.description_en: Professor Armando Dippet (October 1637–1992) and was succeeded by Albus Dumbledore. He was a "nearly bald and a somewhat feeble" man in his elderly years and died in late 1992.

data.name_ja: アーノルド・ピースグッド

data.description_en: Arthur Weasley (b. 6 February 1950) was an English pure-blood wizard in the employ of the Ministry of Magic, as well as a member of the second Order of the Phoenix. He was a staunch believer in the equality of all magical and Muggle folk and was the head of the Weasley family.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【アストリア・グリーングラス】ドラコ・マルフォイの妻でスコーピウス・マルフォイの母。ハリーたちの同級生、ダフネ・グリーングラスの妹です。

Astoria began attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry in 1993, two years below her future husband, Draco Malfoy, and her elder sister, Daphne Greengrass.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【オーガスタ・ロングボトム】ネビル・ロングボトムの祖母。厳格な性格で孫に高い期待を寄せました。ルーピン先生のまね妖怪についての授業で服装が詳細に語られていました。

data.description_en: Augusta Longbottom (b. pre-1947) was a pure-blood witch who married into the Longbottom family. She was the mother of famous Auror Frank Longbottom, mother-in-law to Auror Alice Longbottom, and grandmother to Neville Longbottom.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【オーガスタス・パイ】聖マンゴ病院の研修医癒者。マグルの縫合術に興味を持っていました。
data.description_en: Augustus Pye was a British wizard and Trainee Healer at St Mungo's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries in the Dai Llewellyn Ward. He was interested in Muggle healing techniques, and used stitches on Arthur Weasley when he was admitted to the hospital after he was attacked by Nagini. Presumably, Nagini's venom made Arthur's wounds impossible to heal in this manner.

data.description_en: Augustus Rookwood was a Dark wizard and a Death Eater loyal to Lord Voldemort. During the First Wizarding War, he was a spy who worked as an Unspeakable in the Department of Mysteries. After the height of the first war, he was named by his comrade Igor Karkaroff, Rookwood was arrested and imprisoned in Azkaban.

data.description_en: Professor Aurora Sinistra was a witch who taught in the Astronomy department at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The professor was present at many important events throughout Harry Potter's time at Hogwarts. In the 1992–1993 school year, the professor was present at the discovery of a petrified student, Justin Finch-Fletchley, and helped transport him with Filius Flitwick, the Charms Master, to Madam Pomfrey in the Hospital Wing.

data.description_en: Professor Bathilda Bagshot (1873 or earlier - late 1997) was a British witch, magical historian and the author of A History of Magic and approximately ten other books. A History of Magic is used in the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry class of the same name, taught by Cuthbert Binns. She lived in Godric's Hollow, and was murdered in the second half of 1997.

data.description_en: Bellatrix "Bella" Lestrange (née Black) (1951 – 2 May 1998) was a British pure-blood Dark witch and a member of the noble House of Black. Bellatrix started her education at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry in the early sixties (either 1962 or 1963), and was Sorted into Slytherin.

data.description_en: Bertie Bott (b. 1935) was a wizarding confectioner, who accidentally created Bertie Bott's Every Flavour Beans. For this, he was featured on a Chocolate Frog Card.

data.description_en: Bertie Higgs was a wizard, who was friend of Tiberius and Rufus Scrimgeour. They would often hunt Nogtails in Norfolk.

data.description_en: Bilius (surname Weasley or Prewett) was a pure-blood wizard and a brother of either Arthur Weasley or Molly Weasley, making him the uncle of their seven children. data.description_en: Blaise Zabini (b. c. 1980) was a wizard and was on friendly terms with multiple fellow Slytherins, including Draco Malfoy and his gang, as well as Pansy Parkinson.

data.description_en: The Bloody Baron (d. 11th century) was a wizard who attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry in the Founders' time and was Sorted into Slytherin House. After Hogwarts, he fell in love with Helena Ravenclaw, but she did not love him in return.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【ボブ】聖マンゴ病院の受付係。
data.description_en: Bob was a British wizard who worked for the British Ministry of Magic, under the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures. He was described as big and bearded.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【ボブ・オグデン】魔法法執行部の職員。ゴーント家を訪れ、マールヴォロを逮捕しました。
data.description_en: Bob Ogden (fl. 1925) was a British wizard who worked in the Department of Magical Law Enforcement, a department of the Ministry of Magic, and led the Magical Law Enforcement Squad in the 1920s. As part of his duties, he once visited the Gaunt Shack, as the Department believed that Morfin Gaunt had not only performed magic in front of a Muggle but also accosted that Muggle, Tom Riddle Snr, and performed a dark charm on him.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【ボロ髭のボドロッド】ゴブリンとの取引に関する条約に反対した魔法使い。
data.description_en: Bodrod the Bearded was a goblin rebel. She was described as appearing almost the same way as Filch.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【ほとんど首無しニック】グリフィンドール寮のゴースト。本名ニコラス・ド・ミムジー－ポーピントン卿。1492年に処刑されましたが、首が完全に切断されなかったため「首無し狩り」に参加できないことを嘆いています。
data.name_ja_from_wiki: ほとんど首無しニック
data.name_ja: ほとんど首無しニック
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Sir Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington, known after his death as Nearly Headless Nick (d. 31 October 1492), was a wizard who attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and was Sorted into Gryffindor House. He was a wizard of the royal court as an adult.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【オリバー・ウッド】グリフィンドール・クィディッチチームのキーパー兼キャプテン。ハリーにクィディッチを教え、勝利への執念は誰よりも強く、試合前の戦術講義は非常に長いことで知られていました。7年生の時、グリフィンドールチームを優勝に導きました。
data.name_ja_from_wiki: オリバー・ウッド
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Oliver Wood (born c. 1975 or 1976) was a wizard who was the Keeper and Captain for the Gryffindor Quidditch team during his time as a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, which he attended from 1987 to 1994. Oliver was known for his determination and skill on the playing field, and his long lectures before practices.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【パンジー・パーキンソン】スリザリン寮の魔女でドラコ・マルフォイの取り巻き。意地悪な性格で知られ、ホグワーツの戦いではヴォルデモートにハリーを引き渡すよう主張し、他寮の生徒たちの反感を買いました。
data.name_ja: パンジー・パーキンソン
data.book_appearances: PS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Pansy Parkinson (b. 1979/1980) was a witch who attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry from 1991 to 1998. She was born into the Parkinson family, members of the Sacred Twenty-Eight.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【パーバティ・パチル】グリフィンドール寮の魔女で、ハリーの同級生。双子の姉妹パドマはレイブンクロー所属。占い学を好み、三大魔法学校対抗試合のクリスマスダンスパーティーでハリーのパートナーを務めました。
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Parvati Patil (b. 1979/1980), was a witch of Indian heritage, daughter of Mr and Mrs Patil, and the identical twin sister of Padma. She was sorted into Gryffindor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, while her sister Padma was sorted into Ravenclaw.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【ピーブズ】ホグワーツ城に棲みつくポルターガイスト。約千年にわたって生徒や職員に悪戯を仕掛け続けています。血みどろ男爵だけが彼を制御でき、管理人フィルチの天敵です。
data.name_ja_from_wiki: ピーブズ
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Peeves was a poltergeist at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, since c. 993. Fond of mischief and chaos, he was a constant pain to the school and its inhabitants, especially Argus Filch, the caretaker, as the only ones able to control him were the Bloody Baron and Albus Dumbledore.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【パーシー・ウィーズリー】ウィーズリー家の三男。監督生から首席となり、魔法省入省後はヴォルデモート卿の復活を認めるかをめぐって家族と決裂。しかしホグワーツの戦いで和解し、弟フレッドの最期を目撃することになりました。
data.name_ja: パーシー・ウィーズリー
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Percy Ignatius "Perce" Weasley (b. 22 August 1976) was an English pure-blood wizard, the third child of Arthur and Molly Weasley . He was the younger brother of Bill and Charlie, the older brother of the late Fred, George, Ron and Ginny Weasley.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【ピーター・ペティグリュー】悪戯仕掛け人の一人で通称ワームテール。ネズミに変身できるアニメーガス。ポッター夫妻の居場所をヴォルデモートに密告した裏切り者で、12年間ロンのペットとして身を隠していました。
data.name_ja_from_wiki: ピーター・ペティグリュー
data.name_ja: ピーター・ペティグリュー
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Peter Pettigrew, , (c. 1960 – March 1998), usually referred to as Wormtail or, in his Animagus form, Scabbers was a wizard who began attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry in 1971 and was sorted into Gryffindor House after the Sorting Hat pondered over which house he belonged in for over five minutes, making him a true Hatstall. During his years at Hogwarts, he became one of the Marauders; he was best friends with Sirius Black, James Potter, and Remus Lupin, and together they created the Marauder's Map.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【ペチュニア・ダーズリー】ハリーの伯母でリリー・ポッターの姉。幼少期に妹が魔女と判明して以来、魔法界への嫉妬と嫌悪を抱き続けました。妹の血を引く彼女がハリーを引き取ったことで、護りの魔法が成立しました。
data.name_ja_from_wiki: ペチュニア・ダーズリー
data.name_ja: ペチュニア・ダーズリー
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Petunia Dursley (née Evans) (pre-1960–pre-2020) was an English Muggle woman, the eldest daughter of Mr and Mrs Evans, and the older sister of the Muggle-born witch Lily Potter. During her childhood, she became resentful of her sister for being a witch, broke off contact with her and refused to have any contact with the wizarding world. She married a Muggle, Vernon Dursley, and they had a son, Dudley.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【ポモーナ・スプラウト】ホグワーツの薬草学教授でハッフルパフ寮の寮監。温室で様々な魔法植物を育てており、秘密の部屋事件ではマンドレイクを栽培し、石化された被害者たちの治療に貢献しました。
data.name_ja_from_wiki: ポモーナ・スプラウト
data.name_ja: ポモーナ・スプラウト
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Professor Pomona Sprout (b. 15 May) By summer 2020, Professor Sprout had formally retired from her position as professor of Herbology.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【ポピー・ポンフリー】ホグワーツの医務室を取り仕切る校医。骨折から石化まであらゆる症状を治療する腕を持ち、患者の安静を何より重視します。クィディッチの試合後は特に忙しくなります。
data.name_ja_from_wiki: ポピー・ポンフリー
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Madam Poppy Pomfrey was a British or Irish witch and the matron at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【ロン・ウィーズリー】ウィーズリー家の六男でハリーの親友。ホグワーツ特急で出会って以来、ハリーとハーマイオニーと共に数々の冒険を経験しました。チェスの名手で、賢者の石を守る試練では巨大チェスを攻略しました。
data.name_ja_from_wiki: ロナルド・ウィーズリー
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Auror Ronald Bilius "Ron" Weasley (b. 1 March 1980) was an English pure-blood After two years as an Auror, he worked at Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes with George to help keep the business thriving after Fred’s death. He and Hermione eventually married and had two children, Rose and Hugo Granger-Weasley.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【シェーマス・フィネガン】ハリーと同学年のグリフィンドール生。アイルランド出身で、父はマグル、母は魔女。魔法を唱えると物が爆発することが多く、羽根を燃やすなど数々の失敗談があります。
data.name_ja: シェーマス・フィネガン
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Seamus Finnigan (b. c. 1980) was an Irish half-blood wizard, son of Muggle Mr Finnigan and Irish witch Mrs Finnigan.

data.book_appearances: COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: The Serpent of Slytherin (c. 993 - 29 May 1993) was a female Basilisk that was placed by Salazar Slytherin in the Chamber of Secrets at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The Basilisk could only be controlled by the Heir of Slytherin, Tom Riddle.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【組み分け帽子】ホグワーツ創設者ゴドリック・グリフィンドールの帽子。新入生の頭に被せると、その人物の資質を見抜き、グリフィンドール、ハッフルパフ、レイブンクロー、スリザリンのいずれかに組み分けます。
data.name_ja_from_wiki: 組分け帽子
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: The Sorting Hat was a sentient magical hat at Hogwarts that was used to determine which of the four school Houses was the best fit for each new student. These four Houses were Gryffindor, the house of bravery, Hufflepuff, the house of hard work, Ravenclaw, the house of intelligence, and Slytherin, the house of ambition. The Sorting Hat originally belonged to Godric Gryffindor, one of the four founders of Hogwarts.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【バーノン・ダーズリー】ハリーの叔父でペチュニアの夫。グラニングズ社の重役を務めるマグル。魔法や魔法使いを極端に嫌い、ハリーの存在を近所に隠し、彼を階段下の物置部屋に住まわせていました。
data.name_ja_from_wiki: バーノン・ダーズリー
data.name_ja: バーノン・ダーズリー
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Vernon Dursley was an English Muggle, younger brother of Marjorie Dursley, husband of Petunia Evans, father of Dudley Dursley, and uncle by marriage of Harry Potter. He lived at 4 Privet Drive, Little Whinging, Surrey, along with his wife and son for twenty years until they were forced into hiding during the escalation of the Second Wizarding War. After Petunia's sister Lily and brother-in-law, James Potter, were killed by Voldemort in their own home, Petunia remained the sole surviving blood relative of Harry's.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【ビンセント・クラッブ】スリザリン寮生でドラコ・マルフォイの取り巻きの一人。父親は死喰い人。知性より腕力で知られ、ホグワーツの戦いで必要の部屋にて自ら放った悪霊の火に巻き込まれ命を落としました。
data.name_ja_from_wiki: ビンセント・クラッブ
data.name_ja: ビンセント・クラッブ
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Vincent Crabbe (c. 1980 – 2 May 1998) was a pure-blood wizard, and the son of Death Eater Crabbe Snr. He came from a line of Dark wizards and Death Eaters, with his father and possibly grandfather before him.

data.tweet_text_ja: 【ビル・ウィーズリー】ウィーズリー家の長男。首席でホグワーツを卒業後、グリンゴッツ魔法銀行で呪い破りとして働きました。神秘部の戦いの際、フェンリール・グレイバックに襲われた傷跡が顔に残っています。フラー・デラクールと結婚しました。
data.name_ja_from_wiki: ウィリアム・ウィーズリー
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: William Arthur "Bill" Weasley (b. 29 November 1970) was an English pure-blood wizard, the first child of Arthur and Molly Weasley and the eldest brother of Charlie, Percy, the late Fred, George, Ron, and Ginny. He attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry from 1982 to 1989 and was Sorted into Gryffindor House.
